components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Brisanet Network in Brazil

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS delivery delays to Brisanet Network in Brazil. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Malitel Mali

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Malitel Mali. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United States Account Security Service Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body:
Our service partner is conducting a planned maintenance from 31 January 2025 at 19:00 PST until 01 February 2025 at 05:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for the following carriers and country: AT&T Mobility United States, Sprint United States, T-Mobile United States, Verizon Wireless United States.

Impacted Products: Lookup Identity Match, Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes

Our SMS carrier partner in the Philippines is conducting an emergency maintenance from 01 February 2025 at 09:00 PST until 01 February 2025 at 09:30 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Globe Telecom, Smart Communications and Dito Telecommunity Philippines handsets via subset of Philippines long codes.

The Indosat network in Indonesia is conducting an emergency maintenance from 01 February 2025 at 11:00 PST until 01 February 2025 at 13:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Indosat Indonesia handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United States MMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our MMS carrier partner in the United States is conducting a planned maintenance from 02 February 2025 at 21:00 PST until 03 February 2025 at 04:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering MMS to T-Mobile United States handsets via subset of United States long codes.
